the SRT file is for subtitles (and they are english). if subtitles don't work when you play video (i did some research when mine didn't work), follow these steps.

1) keep them in the same folder
2) download directvobsub at  
3) locate mplayer in windows media player folder
4) open and drag video file into mplayer. 
enjoy!

if you don't have mplayer, google it. =)

Thanks for the up.

Movie worked fine for me, I have the CCCP codec pack installed. it uses Media Player Classic by default & added the subtitle file to the movie fine.

I saw this movie many years back, and I remember 2 extra scenes in it (one with 20 people singing & dancing infront of Mui's work, and another with the whole team insulting Mui when she dressed up), so I may have seen an extended version, but those were bad scenes and this version is better without them.

Video quality isn't perfect, though the movie may have been made in that quality, I recall the previous version I saw was about the same.

The ending credits were cut off.... I remember there being funny out-takes in them.

Audio was fine (it's in the original language).

Overall I quite enjoyed this torrent, though there is room for improvement.

If this comment has helped you, please make a helpful comment on some of the torrents you download in return & help us all :)
